sentences.en: The lissome birchbark canoe seemed to be a fish, so easily did it cut through the rolling black waves and ranks of ice.
sentences.cn: 轻盈的桦皮舟像一条大鱼，在滚滚的黑色波涛和冰排中间飞一般地前进。

sentences.en: We were schooner - rigged and rakish , with a long and lissome hull ( John Masefield )
sentences.cn: 我们的船挂有大帆,流线形, 船身长,形态优美 ( 约翰梅斯菲尔德 )

words.tran_cn: 柔软的；敏捷的；轻快的（等于lissome）

trans.tran_en: supple in the limbs or body; lithe; flexible
